plugins.name: context7
plugins.description: Upstash Context7 MCP server for up-to-date documentation lookup. Pull version-specific documentation and code examples directly from source repositories into your LLM context.

plugins.name: github
plugins.description: Official GitHub MCP server for repository management. Create issues, manage pull requests, review code, search repositories, and interact with GitHub's full API directly from Claude Code.

plugins.name: linear
plugins.description: Linear issue tracking integration. Create issues, manage projects, update statuses, search across workspaces, and streamline your software development workflow with Linear's modern issue tracker.

plugins.name: neon
plugins.description: Neon serverless Postgres integration. Manage databases, branches, and projects. Query data, create database branches for development, and scale your Postgres infrastructure seamlessly.

plugins.name: playwright
plugins.description: Browser automation and end-to-end testing MCP server by Microsoft. Enables Claude to interact with web pages, take screenshots, fill forms, click elements, and perform automated browser testing workflows.

plugins.name: sentry
plugins.description: Sentry error monitoring integration. Track errors, investigate issues, analyze stack traces, and monitor application performance. Debug production issues faster with real-time error insights and context.

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack workspace integration. Search messages, access channels, read threads, and stay connected with your team's communications while coding. Find relevant discussions and context quickly.

plugins.name: statsig
plugins.description: Statsig feature management integration. Manage feature flags, run A/B experiments, analyze metrics, and control feature rollouts. Make data-driven decisions with real-time experimentation insights.

plugins.name: storybook
plugins.description: Storybook local development integration. Search your storybook for relevant components and reference documentation.

plugins.name: stripe
plugins.description: Stripe development plugin for Claude. Build payment integrations, manage webhooks, and interact with the Stripe API.

plugins.name: vercel
plugins.description: Vercel deployment and hosting integration. Manage deployments, environment variables, domains, and monitor your frontend infrastructure.
